title: Evaluation of the influence of lithium-ion battery composition on thermal power generation
content:
Sustainable Energy Fuels, 2024, Advance Article
DOI: 10.1039/D4SE00191E, Paper

Electrochemical heat generation and temperature distribution of three lithium-ion batteries of different chemical composition were experimentally assessed.
